sn35.124:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn35.124:1.2: Atha kho uggo gahapati vesaliko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho uggo gahapati vesaliko bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.124:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme no parinibbayanti?
sn35.124:1.4: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme parinibbayanti”ti?
sn35.124:2.1: “Santi kho, gahapati, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.124:2.2: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati. Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato tannissitam vinnanam hoti tadupadanam.
sn35.124:2.5: santi kho, gahapati, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.124:2.6: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati. Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato tannissitam vinnanam hoti tadupadanam.
sn35.124:2.8: Ayam kho, gahapati, hetu, ayam paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme no parinibbayanti.
sn35.124:3.1: Santi ca kho, gahapati, cakkhuvinneyya rupa, ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.124:3.2: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati. Tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato na tannissitam vinnanam hoti, na tadupadanam.
sn35.124:3.5: santi kho, gahapati, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.124:3.6: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati, tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato. Na tannissitam vinnanam hoti, na tadupadanam.
sn35.124:3.8: Ayam kho, gahapati, hetu ayam paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme parinibbayanti”ti.
